name: Camiquest
description:
After a newly trained warrior stumbles upon a mysterious ancient structure and claims to be a True Hero, he must battle enemies, power-up, prove himself, and discover the secrets that lie within.

Camiquest is a 2D RPG Adventure game following a warrior hungry for adventure. This is an indie development project that I am working on in my spare time, both for the experience and to create something I am proud of. I would love for you to download and try it out for yourself as well as leave any feedback you may have in the comments!
